channel.title: blogdown on Teddy's online desktop
channel.description: Recent content in blogdown on Teddy's online desktop

item.title: R blogdown and GitHub
item.description: It’s taken all day to get blogdown to sync with GitHub. I already had a repo set up at https://tedtwong.github.io/ and I had set up a blogdown folder in R Studio, let’s call it: R/blogdown. I wasn’t too familiar with how to set up git to sync the R/blogdown/public folder with https://tedtwong.github.io/ repo so that I can version control blogdown files and host the files on GitHub at the same time.
